Assessment Description:

The Python Development Assessment is a comprehensive test designed to evaluate the knowledge and proficiency of individuals in Python programming language. The assessment consists of 30 multiple-choice questions that cover various aspects of Python programming such as data types, control structures, functions, file handling, and object-oriented programming.

Python is a widely used programming language, especially in the fields of data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. It has gained popularity among developers due to its simplicity, versatility, and readability. Python is also an interpreted language, meaning that it does not require a compilation process and is executed line by line, which makes it easy to debug and test.

For employees, the Python Development Assessment can be a valuable tool to assess their proficiency in Python and identify areas that need improvement. By taking the assessment, employees can demonstrate their knowledge and expertise in Python programming, which can increase their chances of getting hired or promoted.

Moreover, the Python Development & Coding Assessment can be used by companies as part of their recruitment and hiring process. Python programming skills are in high demand, and companies need to ensure that they are hiring candidates who have the required skills and knowledge to work with Python. The assessment can help companies identify the right candidates for the job and reduce the time and resources required for the recruitment process.

In addition, the Python Development & Coding Assessment can also be used by companies to evaluate the skills and knowledge of their existing employees. By identifying knowledge gaps and areas that need improvement, companies can provide training and development opportunities to their employees, which can increase their productivity and contribute to the success of the company.

Overall, Python development skills are highly sought after in the job market, especially in fields such as data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. Having a strong foundation in Python programming can open up a wide range of career opportunities for individuals.

Python is also a popular language for building web applications, scripting, and automation. Many companies use Python to develop their internal tools and applications, which can improve the efficiency and productivity of their operations.

Assessment Description:


Product management and development are critical functions within any organization. They involve the creation, launch, and ongoing improvement of products and services to meet customer needs and drive revenue growth. As such, assessing an employee's proficiency in these areas is essential for companies to ensure that their product strategy is on track and aligned with their business goals.


A product management and development assessment can help companies identify skill gaps and areas of improvement for their employees, leading to better performance and increased productivity. By measuring an employee's understanding of market trends, customer needs, product development, and product launch strategies, companies can better equip their workforce to deliver products that meet customer demands and stay ahead of competitors.


For employees, a product management and development assessment is an opportunity to showcase their skills and knowledge in this critical area. It allows them to demonstrate their understanding of product strategy, market analysis, and development processes, which can lead to career advancement opportunities within their organization. As they gain experience in product management and development, employees can hone their skills and become valuable contributors to their company's success.


In addition to career advancement, product management and development topics are also useful for building a successful career. These skills are transferable across industries and can be leveraged to drive innovation, create new products, and launch successful startups. For individuals who are passionate about creating products that solve customer needs, a career in product management and development can be highly rewarding and fulfilling.


Overall, a product management and development assessment is a critical tool for companies and employees alike. It allows companies to evaluate their workforce's proficiency in this area, identify areas of improvement, and build a culture of product innovation. For employees, it is an opportunity to showcase their skills, advance their careers, and build a successful future in product management and development. By investing in product management and development assessment, companies can stay ahead of the competition and drive growth and innovation in the market.

courseDetails.title: Certification in Inventory Management & Control - Accredited

courseDetails.longDescription:
This IAOTH, UK accredited - Certificate in Inventory Management & Control, helps you learn Inventory Management and Inventory Control skills, stock calculation, stock control, etc. After doing this course, you will be able to be part of Supply Chain Management Team in the fields of manufacturing, restaurant management, Logistics Management, import export, shipping, international trade, freight forwarding, Warehouse Management, Procurement, purchasing, category management, purchase management, etc.

This concise programme is designed, keeping in mind that you may not have any prior knowledge about Art Therapy, and you want to learn despite your busy schedule. So we have tried to avoid jargon as much as possible and simplified concepts and terminology for you.

In this course, you will learn:

  • Introduction to Inventory Management

  • Inventory Management: Real-life Successes and Failures

  • Inventory Types and Categories

  • Determining Your Needs: Key Metrics and Indicators

  • Safety Stock Calculation: A Step-by-Step Guide

  • The Chargeable & Volumetric Weight Techniques

  • Real-time Stock Monitoring Techniques

  • The Pareto Principle in Inventory Management

  • Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) for Inventory Control

  • Checklist for Choosing and Setting Up Warehouse

  • DIY Guide to Designing an Efficient Warehouse Layout

  • Modern Tools & Equipment for the Smart Warehouse

  • International Shipping: Step-by-Step Guide

  • Inventory Documents: What, When, and How

  • International Commercial Terms (Incoterms)

  • The Third-Party Logistics (3PL)

  • Guide to Build a Successful Partnership

  • Case Studies: Successful Outsourcing Models

  • Inventory Costs Breakdown

  • Cost Cutting Strategies

  • Making Cost-effective Inventory Plan: Step-by-Step Guide

  • Adapting to E-commerce

  • IoT for Real-time Tracking & Monitoring

  • Steps to a Sustainable, Green Warehouse

  • Waste Reduction and Recycling
targetAudiences: This course is for anyone who wants to learn professional inventory management and inventory control and be part of supply chain management team.

This Course is for the Beginner's Only!

Discover the Power of Oracle Primavera P6 with our Beginner's Step-By-Step Training to Effortlessly Build Project Schedules

If you're eager to quickly grasp the basic features of Oracle Primavera P6 and want to develop a strong foundation in project planning and scheduling, then this course is tailor-made for you. Designed for beginners, it provides a comprehensive understanding of Primavera P6 fundamentals, empowering you to seamlessly construct project schedules in no time.

Oracle Primavera P6 stands as a cornerstone in the realm of project management, offering unrivaled capabilities in scheduling, planning, and control. Join us on this transformative learning journey as we unravel the potential of Primavera P6, equipping you with the skills to effectively manage and control project schedules, activities, resources, and more...

Key Course Highlights:

  • Rapidly learn the core functionalities of Oracle Primavera P6

  • Gain hands-on experience in building robust project schedules

  • Master the art of project schedule management, from start till the end

  • Unleash the power of Primavera P6 for efficiently creating ativities, resource allocations etc

Let the world-renowned Primavera P6 be your trusted companion as you embark on your project management endeavors. Enroll today and unlock your true potential with Oracle Primavera P6!


The Topics Covered:

Explore the following core topics and empower yourself to effectively navigate Oracle Primavera P6:

  1. Building a Strong Foundation:

    • Understand the Enterprise Project Structure for streamlined project organization

    • Learn creating projects in Primavera P6

  2. Structuring Your Project:

    • Dive into the intricacies of Work Breakdown Structure (WBS) for efficient project planning

    • Learn to define project activities and establish relationships between them

  3. Resource Management:

    • Creating and assigning resources to project activities

    • Assigning project expenses

  4. Time Management and Baseline:

    • Create project calendars to align with project timelines

    • Establish project baselines for progress tracking

  5. Project Constraints:

    • Learn the art of setting project constraints

  6. Schedule Management and Reporting:

    • Update and maintain project schedules

    • Seamlessly import and export projects for enhanced collaboration

    • Monitor project activities

    • Printing reports to communicate project status

Immerse yourself in this comprehensive curriculum and unlock the full potential of Oracle Primavera P6. Enroll now and embark on a transformative journey towards becoming a proficient member of the project team.


Course Beneficial for: The business students, project management professionals, managers, project planners, project schedulers, project coordinators who want to learn or refresh their knowledge of the Oracle Primavera P6 software fundamentals, working across different industries or services sectors such as IT, Telecommunications, Engineering, Procurement and Construction, Oil and Gas etc.


P.S. We're Dedicated to Your Success!

To us, your progress and achievement are our top priorities. We're committed to providing unwavering support throughout your learning journey. Whether you have questions, need clarifications, or require assistance at any point during the course, we're here to help!

The Q&A section of the course is your go-to hub for interaction. It's designed to foster collaboration between instructors and fellow learners, ensuring a dynamic and engaging learning environment. Don't hesitate to ask any question, no matter how basic or advanced. We embrace curiosity and encourage active participation to enhance your growth as a Primavera P6 professional.

Our team is dedicated to delivering timely and comprehensive responses to all your queries. We value the importance of a smooth and enjoyable learning experience, and we're here to make that a reality.

So, dive into the course, immerse yourself in the lessons, and make the most of the Q&A section whenever you need guidance. Your journey to mastering Primavera P6 starts here, and we're excited to be a part of your success story.

Let's thrive together!

courseDetails.title: Kubernetes with HELM: Kubernetes for Absolute Beginners CKA
courseDetails.shortDescription: Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) | GKE & CKA Deep Dive | Production grade K8s with HELM from Scratch
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course on Kubernetes Certification Suitable for  Beginners was primarily designed with beginners in mind with Hands-On Labs.

You'll learn a lot of DevOps Kubernetes workflow hands-on in this course.

This Kubernetes Administrator allows you to demonstrate that you have the skills necessary to build and manage Kubernetes environments. This course will provide you with the knowledge and hands-on experience that you will need to be a successful Kubernetes administrator in the real world and pass the CKA exam.

You learn faster and better when you learn by doing. With that in mind, this course has been designed to allow you to practice Kubernetes Orchestration through a 100% hands-on experience. Our Training Architects have hand-selected a set of the best Kubernetes hands-on labs we have to offer to accomplish this.

Everything in this course will be on one or more Linux servers provisioned with whatever is needed through our hands-on lab and Cloud platform.

There's no reason to wait; learn by doing today.

This course is a deep dive into the Kubernetes network model, the components involved, and how to deploy, manage and troubleshoot the cluster network.

Kubernetes is the de-facto standard for orchestrating containerized apps, and Google Kubernetes Engine is its most fully realized implementation. Join me in the comprehensive exploration of this much-in-demand technology in Google Kubernetes Engine Deep Dive.


Who this course is for:

  • Software Developers, DevOps Engineers, Application Developers, Software Test Engineers, IT admins, Managers, Executives, or Anyone interested in learning Docker Containers and Kubernetes
targetAudiences: DevOps Beginners & Intermediate Level Engineers
Beginners in Orchestration & Cloud Technology
System Administrators
DevOps Professionals
Application Developers

courseDetails.title: Fastest Laravel app building trick

courseDetails.longDescription:
What you'll learn

  • Initialization of a Laravel app using blueprint

  • Building blueprint yml file

  • Autocreation of database migrations and eloquent models

  • Autocreation of Controllers , and actions

  • Autocreation of Mailable , Jobs , Events ..

  • Change you whole way of thinking of Laravel and Laravel 8 apps building

  • Configure your blueprint to work better for you

  • Increase development speed

  • Promote Laravel conventions

  • Just think how your classes and objects should be in the oop way , and tell that to blueprint , and let it be built for you .

  • Learn php laravel code generation tool that is so intuitive and straightforward

  • Move from your database ERD (entity-relationship diagrams)  to your fully-functioning Data Access Layer.

  • Get rid of repetitive tasks and routine debugging process

  • Get rid of name-changes headaches by writing the name only once , and leaving the conversion on blueprint

  • Focus on the engineering of your new product rather than the implementation itself

  • Fast Intro to YML / YAML Syntax

  • More and more contents about this topic is to be added , including the extending of several parts of blueprint , to be more great

Reaching a working Laravel api , or Laravel backend is something pretty fast , with blueprint

Even if you have an existing project, blueprint can be adopted and used very efficiently because blueprint engine won't affect any of the existing components , it will only affect components that is created by itself , because blueprint keeps track over every change that it made .

I 've set a simple kit for you so that you can apply your changes and test very fast , so that you can apply your tests in a fast way , and gain more experience on this library , so that your skills in building new apps  with blueprint become dependable .

courseDetails.title: User Experience Design Professional Certification
courseDetails.shortDescription: User Experience Design UI UX Certification by The Retail Banking School and preparing for other types of certification
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the User Experience Design Professional Certification

That assessment helps to employees and companies in internal certification procedures.

Its not a course with theory, its exam for certification / assessment


Udemy doesn't provide certificates for exam type of courses yet. You may:

  1. Include info about Assessment / Certification to your CV / Linked in (with choosing of RBS as a Educational Provider)
    after successful finishing of test

  2. Write us with screens of finished tests for getting of MTF type of diploma
    please also provide name/surname at Udemy and your preferred name for diploma

In case of any questions, or for certificate getting you may write us to email welcome  gtf . pt ot find the contacts at our web site gtf . pt


Assessment Description:

A User Experience Design assessment is a crucial tool for evaluating the knowledge and skills of individuals in this field. It consists of a series of questions that assess a person’s understanding of various aspects of UX design, including user research, information architecture, usability testing, prototyping, and visual design. The assessment helps to determine a person’s level of expertise in UX design and identify areas where they may need further development.


For employees, taking a User Experience Design assessment can be a valuable way to assess their skills and knowledge in this field. It can help them to identify areas where they may need further development, as well as areas where they excel. By taking the assessment, employees can gain a better understanding of their strengths and weaknesses in UX design and work to improve their skills where necessary.


For companies, conducting User Experience Design assessments for their employees can be an effective way to evaluate their workforce’s skills and knowledge in this field. It helps companies to identify areas where their employees may need further training or development and make decisions about how to allocate resources to improve their team’s overall expertise in UX design. By investing in their employees’ skills and knowledge in UX design, companies can improve the quality of their products and services, leading to better customer satisfaction and increased profits.


User Experience Design is a valuable and in-demand skill set in today’s job market. Companies across industries are recognizing the importance of UX design in creating successful products and services that meet the needs of their users. As a result, there is a growing need for individuals with expertise in UX design.


Building a career in UX design begins with a solid understanding of the foundational principles and skills in this field. A User Experience Design assessment can help individuals to evaluate their skills and knowledge and identify areas where they need further development. By continually developing their skills in UX design, individuals can become more valuable to employers and increase their opportunities for career advancement.


In addition to technical skills, successful UX designers must also possess strong communication and collaboration skills. They must be able to work effectively with cross-functional teams, including product managers, engineers, and stakeholders, to ensure that the design meets the needs of all stakeholders. They must also be able to communicate their design decisions effectively, both verbally and visually, to stakeholders who may not have a background in UX design.


User Experience Design assessment is a valuable tool for both employees and companies. It cans help individuals to evaluate their skills and knowledge in this field and identify areas where they need further development, as well as help companies to evaluate their workforce’s skills and knowledge in UX design and make decisions about how to allocate resources to improve their team’s expertise in this field. By investing in their skills and knowledge in UX design, individuals can build successful careers in this growing field, while companies can create successful products and services that meet the needs of their users.

courseDetails.title: Curso Ultimate Academic Writing: ¡Investigación + Redacción
courseDetails.shortDescription: ¡Su curso de escritura académica esencial con ejemplos de investigación y consejos prácticos de redacción de ensayos!
courseDetails.longDescription:
** ¡Acceso instantáneo a las diapositivas en español e inglés! **

Este curso está especialmente desarrollado para estudiantes que necesitan los conocimientos esenciales para prepararlos para escribir y defender su tesis/disertación de manera eficiente y eficaz. ¡He creado 17 conferencias que cubren todas las facetas de la escritura de tesis en una hora y media!

Resumen

Comenzaré con el final en mente; ¿Cómo se evalúa su tesis? Basado en esta pregunta central, explico mi fórmula del éxito y lo llevo de la mano desde la selección del tema hasta la defensa exitosa de la tesis. Explicaré paso a paso los procedimientos para manejar ciertas fases de su proyecto de investigación y proporcionaré muchos ejemplos prácticos. En promedio, cada conferencia dura unos cinco minutos.

Después de completar este curso, tendrá los conocimientos esenciales para completar con éxito su proyecto de investigación, porque conoce los ingredientes necesarios. Este conocimiento es invaluable cuando está escribiendo un artículo académico, una tesis de MBA, una tesis de doctorado o una disertación.

¿Quién debe inscribirse?

- Estudiantes en prácticas
- Estudiantes de licenciatura
- Estudiantes de maestría
- Estudiantes de MBA
- Estudiantes de doctorado / disertación / doctorado

¿Qué aprenderás con este curso?

En aproximadamente una hora sabrá cómo trabajar en su tesis desde la preparación hasta la defensa exitosa. Aprenderás:

  • cómo su supervisor evaluará su investigación;

  • mi fórmula del éxito;

  • qué hace un buen tema (con un ejemplo práctico);

  • cómo se divide su esfuerzo por fase de investigación;

  • cómo monitorear su progreso;

  • un procedimiento de cuatro pasos para escribir una introducción eficaz;

  • un procedimiento de tres pasos para realizar su revisión de la literatura;

  • sobre métodos comunes de recopilación de datos;

  • cómo limpiar su conjunto de datos;

  • cómo manejar las entrevistas;

  • cómo analizar datos de entrevistas;

  • qué significa un efecto de moderación para el análisis cuantitativo;

  • un procedimiento de dos pasos para escribir una discusión efectiva;

  • cómo escribir la sección de limitaciones y trabajos futuros;

  • un procedimiento de tres pasos para escribir una conclusión efectiva;

  • cómo crear y administrar citas en Microsoft Word;

  • cómo minimizar el esfuerzo en riesgo mediante la creación de copias de seguridad frecuentes;

  • cómo manejar los contratiempos durante su investigación;

  • cómo presentar los resultados de su tesis;

  • un procedimiento de tres pasos para el manejo de preguntas difíciles durante la defensa de la tesis.

Estoy completamente convencido de los beneficios, pero no veo por qué debería aprender todo esto de usted.

Es cierto, déjame explicarte brindándote una descripción general de mi experiencia:

- Candidato a doctorado a tiempo parcial. ¡Leo la ciencia, obtendrás el conocimiento! ¿Qué más quieres?
- Director de Seguridad de la Información. Gestión de profesionales de Seguridad, Privacidad y Calidad. Responsable de implementar y mantener una postura de riesgo organizacional bien equilibrada;
- Consultor de calidad de software. He asesorado a muchos gerentes de proyectos de TI grandes y pequeños sobre varios aspectos relacionados con el software;
- Además de la experiencia como consultor de TI, tengo las siguientes certificaciones: International Software Testing Qualifications Board (ISTQB), Certified Secure Software Lifecycle professional (CSSLP), Certified Profesional de seguridad de sistemas de información (CISSP), Auditor certificado de sistemas de información (CISA), Profesional certificado de privacidad de la información (CIPP/Europa), Máster certificado en SCRUM, Fundación Togaf, Auditor líder ISO 27001, Implementador líder ISO 27001, Framework ágil escalado líder, Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900) y base PRINCE 2.

¡Adelante, haga clic en el botón de inscripción y nos vemos en la lección 1!

Saludos,
Soerin

Cuatro testimonios

#1

"Recomiendo encarecidamente a Soerin como su asesor de tesis en base a mi experiencia positiva con él durante los últimos meses. Soerin me guió a través de las diferentes fases de la investigación, desde la revisión de la literatura hasta la conclusión y las recomendaciones. Haciendo preguntas de sondeo en lugar de dar las respuestas de inmediato. a mis preguntas, Soerin no solo contribuyó a una tesis de la que estoy orgulloso, sino que también me hizo un mejor investigador. Las recomendaciones que dio Soerin durante su revisión de los borradores de mi tesis fueron útiles y, a menudo, formaron la base de nuevos conocimientos. Cuando Golpeé un bloque mientras trabajaba en un análisis factorial, Soerin me ayudó a través de una sesión de Skype durante la cual miró mi salida de SPSS y SmartPLS en vivo. Debido a su entusiasmo, actitud positiva y mentalidad de "puedo hacerlo", mis interacciones con Soerin siempre fueron agradable y motivador.

Soerin, ¡muchas gracias por tu apoyo!"

Kevin
Maestría en Ciencias en Contabilidad


#2

"Definitivamente recomendaría a Soerin como asesor de tesis. Soerin no solo ayuda con el plan de investigación de los estudiantes, sino que también ayuda a mejorar el plan al hacer recomendaciones para la investigación avanzada (y análisis adicionales). Soerin es un entrenador muy bueno y trabaja muy estructurado, lo que provoca que los estudiantes se apasionen. Soerin es fácilmente accesible y responde a preguntas y/o ambigüedades. Soerin ciertamente está dispuesta a ayudar a los estudiantes cuando surgen problemas. Soerin tiene mucho conocimiento, no solo en el contenido sino también en la estructura y el diseño del estudio. También puede comunicar este conocimiento de manera adecuada, para que las cosas sean comprensibles para los demás. Soerin revisó la tesis muy detalladamente, haciendo comentarios en Word. Las notas de revisión serán claras y transparentes. Soerin está muy interesado en respaldar sus artículos escritos con citas apropiadas. También ayuda a que su estilo de escritura sea una 'prueba de diario'. Da ejemplos (referencias a artículos de otros artículos) y hace sugerencias para mejorar su estilo de escritura. Soerin motiva a los demás a “sacar lo mejor de uno mismo”. Al revisar mi tesis también noté que Soerin siempre revisaba con la pregunta del por qué. Con esto, provoca que otro piense aún más sobre el trasfondo de los textos que se escriben. Soy muy positivo sobre los tiempos de contacto que tuve con Soerin, comparte su información con gran pasión, es paciente y se toma su tiempo para ayudarlo con preguntas o ambigüedades. No tengo ningún punto de mejora para Soerin como asesor de tesis. Una vez más, recomendaría Soerin a cualquiera".

Josina
Maestría en Ciencias en Contabilidad


#3

"Mi tesis de maestría (en derecho de la salud) fue revisada recientemente por Soerin. Si bien esta tesis estaba fuera de su campo, me brindó comentarios valiosos sobre las partes más cruciales de mi tesis, que eran la principal relevancia entre la pregunta de investigación y las subpreguntas, la tesis aplicada metodología y estructura teórica para lograr consistencia entre el título, el problema, el propósito y las preguntas de investigación. También le pedí que revisara mi Conclusión final y recomendaciones. Si bien su profesión es la contabilidad, sus consejos y notas clave fueron muy útiles y motivadores. Me permite afinar mi tesis en algunos aspectos, como la reproducción de los resultados de mi investigación y la literatura teórica utilizada. Creo que es un verdadero valor agregado dejar que un maestro profesional revise su tesis, quien revisa docenas de tesis de maestría por semana. Al final, realmente recomendaría a cualquiera que deje que Soerin lo revise, lo que lo motivará a hacer un esfuerzo adicional para terminar su tesis a tiempo".

Jessica
Maestría en Derecho


#4

"Por la presente me gustaría recomendar a Soerin como supervisora/mentora de tesis por escrito.

No por tu ego, sino como un gran beneficio para futuros estudiantes.

La razón por la que lo recomendaría es porque creo que se ve fallando cuando un estudiante falla. La armonía en el interés tanto de él como de los estudiantes hace que el servicio entregado sea un "estándar de excelencia".

¡Cuando se habla de actualidad o de literatura de apoyo, Soerin es perfecta! Él sabe de lo que está hablando, lo que le da mucha comodidad al autor de la tesis en cada revisión. El apoyo al revisar la tesis de manera detallada es muy valioso. Su revisión es de alta calidad, lo que ayuda a mejorar un estilo de escritura estructurado.

La interacción entre Soerin y los estudiantes es buena. Es una persona a quien acudir (accesible). Además de eso, es muy flexible para revisar una tesis o responder preguntas por correo electrónico o mensaje de texto.

El conocimiento que tiene sobre la recopilación de datos y el análisis de los datos es de un nivel excesivamente alto. Múltiples programas para analizar pero también múltiples formas de analizar. Conectar los puntos para un estudiante en los momentos en que más lo necesitan es una acción cómoda. Por ejemplo: en mi experiencia estaba metida en un análisis y él no me dijo la respuesta, pero me mostró una puerta que me hizo pensar en cómo lidiar con un obstáculo.

Se puede lograr una mejora en las áreas de detener a un estudiante cuando un estudiante solo se enfoca en los plazos y menos en la calidad de las partes de la tesis entregadas anteriormente. En segundo lugar, se puede crear un valor agregado prestando atención a la terminología utilizada y las traducciones de la literatura inglesa.

Quiero agradecer a Soerin escribiendo esta carta. Estoy agradecido por lo que ha hecho. Ha contribuido en parte a que yo pueda usar el título maestro con orgullo".

Gary
Maestría en Ciencias en Contabilidad
targetAudiences: Principiantes en la investigación que no quieren fallar en su tarea de investigación
Estudiantes que están ansiosos por ejecutar una investigación rigurosa para su tesis/trabajo/ensayo
Cualquier persona interesada en la redacción académica y/o de tesis

courseDetails.title: Excel VBA for Beginner to Advanced
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlock the Power of Excel: Master VBA from Beginner to Advanced
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to supercharge your Excel skills and become a proficient VBA programmer? Look no further! The Excel VBA for Beginner to Advanced course is designed to take you from a complete beginner to an advanced level in Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) programming within Excel.

In this comprehensive course, you will embark on an exciting journey of learning and mastering Excel's powerful programming language. Whether you're a professional looking to enhance your productivity, an analyst seeking to automate tasks and streamline processes, or an Excel enthusiast eager to dive deeper into VBA, this course is tailored to meet your needs.

With a practical approach, this course provides step-by-step guidance and hands-on exercises to reinforce your learning. No prior programming experience is required, as we start from the basics and gradually progress to advanced topics. By the end of the course, you will have the skills and confidence to write efficient VBA code, manipulate data, create user-friendly interfaces, automate repetitive tasks, and generate insightful reports.

Here's a glimpse of what you will learn throughout the course:

  • Understanding the fundamentals of VBA and its integration with Excel

  • Recording and editing macros to automate tasks

  • Writing and executing VBA code to manipulate worksheets, ranges, and cells

  • Working with variables, data types, and operators

  • Implementing control structures, loops, and conditional statements

  • Creating user forms for data input and interaction

  • Handling errors and debugging your code

  • Advanced techniques such as working with arrays, files, and external data sources

  • Optimizing your code for better performance

  • Best practices and tips for efficient VBA programming

By the end of this course, you will have a solid foundation in Excel VBA, enabling you to unlock the full potential of Excel and become a proficient VBA programmer. You'll be equipped with the skills to automate complex tasks, save time, and boost your productivity.

Enroll now and take the first step towards becoming an Excel VBA expert. Let's embark on this exciting learning journey together!

Who this course is for:

  • Excel users who want to enhance their skills and automate tasks using VBA

  • Professionals seeking to improve their productivity and efficiency in Excel

  • Analysts, data scientists, and researchers who want to leverage VBA for data manipulation and analysis

  • Anyone interested in learning programming within the context of Excel
targetAudiences: Beginner who want to learn Excel VBA

courseDetails.title: Universidad Angular - De Cero a Experto en Angular!
courseDetails.shortDescription: Domina Angular 11 y crea aplicaciones web del mundo real con TypeScript, Firebase, Firestore, JWT y más!
courseDetails.longDescription:
¡Ya somos más de 104,000 alumnos!. Tu curso de Universidad Angular comienza absolutamente desde Cero, ¡No necesitas saber Angular! Tampoco necesitas tener conocimientos de ninguna tecnología, ya que en este curso te enseñaremos absolutamente todo lo que necesitas desde cero.

Estudiaremos desde la configuración hasta la implementación del framework de Angular, ¡Este curso lo cubre todo! Aprenderás todo sobre Componentes, Directivas, Servicios, Formularios, HTTP Access, Autenticación, Optimización de una aplicación Angular con módulos y mucho más, todo con ejemplos del mundo real.

¡Pero eso no es todo! ¡Este curso también te mostrará cómo usar el CLI de Angular y presentará un proyecto completo, que te permitá practicar todas las cosas aprendidas a lo largo del curso!

Angular es uno de los frameworks frontend más modernos, eficientes en rendimiento y potentes que puedas aprender. Te permitirá crear excelentes aplicaciones web que ofrecen increíbles experiencias de usuario. Aprende todos los fundamentos que necesita saber para comenzar a desarrollar aplicaciones Angular de inmediato.

Este curso utiliza TypeScript. TypeScript es el idioma principal utilizado por el equipo oficial de Angular y el idioma que verás principalmente en los tutoriales de Angular. Es un superconjunto de JavaScript y hace que escribir aplicaciones de Angular sea realmente fácil. Sin embargo, el conocimiento de TypeScript no es necesario, el conocimiento básico de JavaScript es suficiente. Además tendrás cursos de bono totalmente gratis para aprender HTML, CSS y JavaScript si aún no estás familiarizado con estas tecnologías. Así que este curso comienza absolutamente desde cero.

¿Por qué Angular?

Angular es el framework JavaScript de mayor crecimiento en los últimos años. Es el sucesor de Angular.js. Las potentes funciones y capacidades de Angular te permitirán crear aplicaciones web complejas, personalizables, modernas, receptivas y fáciles de usar.

Angular es más rápido que Angular 1 y ofrece un enfoque de desarrollo mucho más flexible y modular. Después de tomar este curso, podrás aprovechar por completo todas esas características y comenzar a desarrollar aplicaciones increíbles de inmediato.

Debido a las drásticas diferencias entre Angular 1 y Angular, no necesitas saber nada sobre Angular.js para poder beneficiarte de este curso y construir tus proyectos con Angular.

¡Este curso te enseñará todos los aspectos básicos sobre módulos, directivas, componentes, databindings, routing, uso de HTTP access y mucho más! En cada sección crearemos un proyecto real. En cada uno de los ejemplos mostraremos las características que ofrece Angular y cómo aplicarlas a proyectos del mundo real.

Específicamente aprenderás:

  • Arquitectura de Angular

  • TypeScript para escribir aplicaciones con Angular

  • Directivas y componentes

  • Cómo funciona databinding

  • Todo sobre enrutamiento (routing) y manejo de navegación.

  • Qué son los pipes y cómo usarlos

  • Cómo acceder a servicios web (por ejemplo, servidores RESTful)

  • Inyección de dependencias y cómo usarlo.

  • Creación y uso de módulos en Angular

  • Optimizar la aplicación Angular para producción

  • Conexión a Firebase y Firestore

  • Despliegue de una aplicación del mundo real a Internet

  • Al final crearemos un proyecto del mundo real

Por si fuera poco, te incluimos cursos de bono de regalo como son:

  • TypeScript (Lo esencial para aplicar este lenguaje con Angular)

  • HTML, CSS y JavaScript (Ideal para los que no cuentan con conocimientos de estas tecnologías aplicadas por Angular)

  • Fundamentos de JavaScript (Ideal para los que no tienen conocimientos de la programación con JavaScript)

¡Y mucho más!

Así que como puedes leer, este es el curso más completo de Angular en UDEMY, ya que te enseñaremos todas las tecnologías que usa Angular si no tienes este conocimiento, por lo que puedes estar seguro que puedes empezar absolutamente desde cero.

Sin más, te veo del otro lado.

Ing. Ubaldo Acosta

Fundador de Global Mentoring.

Experiencia y Conocimiento para tu Vida.
targetAudiences: Cualquier persona interesada en aprender el framework de Angular
Cualquier persona en aprender el framework más popular de JavaScript al día de hoy

Cualquier persona que ya tenga conocimientos de HTML, CSS y JavaScript y quiera llevar su conocimiento al siguiente nivel, sin embargo ningún conocimiento previo es requerido, todo se proporciona en el curso

courseDetails.title: The Complete Personal Finance for Kids and Teenagers Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Teach your children financial literacy through a fun, animated cartoon by an Oxford grad
courseDetails.longDescription:
Whether you end up with a financially comfortable future or struggle endlessly with debt depends on only one thing: your financial literacy. Are you ready to take your personal finance knowledge to the next level while having fun? Do you want a teacher who explains complex finance, business, and economic concepts in an engaging and fun way? Do you wish you had been taught personal finance at an early age?

Then, this course is perfect for you!

In this course, you will learn in a fun, exciting, and engaging way. The course uses animated cartoon videos to help kids and teenagers intuitively understand everything they need to know about personal finance. Topics range from basic financial concepts to investing and saving for retirement.

Besides teaching essential topics that students would learn from any personal finance class, this course provides applicable real-life, practical business concepts that will help your kids start at an early age and become more successful in managing their personal finances.

This course aims to provide you with financial wisdom that'll help you manage your money to create wealth and live a good life. You will learn many things that take place in the economy to make you smarter with your personal finance. The course is organized into six sections as follows:

  • Section 1: Personal Finance

    • Lecture 1. Invest In Yourself

    • Lecture 2. Financial Freedom

    • Lecture 3. The Three Little Pigs & Financial Planning

    • Lecture 4. How Should We Think About Money?

    • Lecture 5. Budgeting

    • Lecture 6. Money vs. Currency

DISCLAIMER: Please be aware that I am not a licensed financial advisor, and the information contained in this course should not be considered as professional financial advice. The content is presented strictly for educational purposes and represents my personal experiences and viewpoints on financial principles. targetAudiences: This visual learning course is designed to teach personal finance in a fun and engaging way to middle school and high school students (10 to 17 years). It is also relevant and engaging for anyone looking for an intuitive understanding of personal finance concepts.

In accordance with Udemy's guidelines and restrictions on certain topics, this course is exclusively intended for purchase by adults for their children or teenagers. courseDetails.title: Basics of Pricing (Arabic) سلسلة التسويق: أساسيات التسعير
courseDetails.shortDescription: التسعير شديد الأهمية في إدارة التسويق، وفي ريادة الأعمال، كيف تتجنب أخطاء التسعير؟  - خطوات تطبيقية مركزة - د.ايهاب مسلم
courseDetails.longDescription:
التسعير من أهم المهام التسويقيةوهو المكون الثاني للمزيج التسويقي: المنتج – السعر – المكان – الترويج

السعر الخاطئ يتسبب في ضياع أربح على الشركة، سواء كان أعلى من اللازم أو أقل
ولذلك فهو قرار شديد الحساسية ويؤثر بشكل مباشر في ربحية الشركة

يناقش الكورس عدة محاور عن التسعير ليقدم للدارس فكرة شاملة عن خطوات ومبادئ الوصل لسعر صحيح يحقق قيمة ومنفعة للعميل، ويحقق أرباح للشركة في نفس الوقت

الموضوعات التى يغطيها الكورس هى:

أخطاء التسعير مكلفة
كيف تتجنب أخطاء التسعير؟

ماهى خطوات التسعير المهمة

استراتيجيات التسعير: هل منتجات مثل ساعات رولكس وسيارات لامبورجيني تعتمد على التكلفة في وضع أسعارها أم ان الاستراتيجية شئ آخر؟

كيف نحسب التكلفة: التكلفة لها عدة مكونات، ويجب أخذها جميعا في الاعتبار، سنتعرف على التكلفة المباشرة وغير المباشرة وكذلك التكلفة الثابتة والمتغيرة، وسنتعرف على نقطة التعادل للمنتجات.

دراسة أسعار المنافسين: وهي خطوة مهمة قبل تحديد السعر، هل سيكون مع متوسط أسعار المنافسين أم أعلى أم أقل؟وكيف نتعرف على متسوط الأسعار في السوق؟

علاقة السعر بالعرض والطلب: قد يتحكم السوق تماما في السعر ون تدخل منا.. متى يكون ذلك؟

الجانب النفسي للسعر: وهو مؤثر جدا في قرار الشراء. ماهو تأثير وجود رقم 9 في السعر؟ وما تأثير حجم كتابة السعر؟ وكيف يكون السعر اكثر اقناعا؟

التسعير حسب الشريحة: هل يمكن بيع منتج واحد، أو نفس الخدمة بعدة أسعار؟ ومتى يكون ذلك صحيحا؟

التسعير حسب الموقع الجغرافي: هل الموقع له علاقة بالسعر؟

courseDetails.title: Forex Made Simple: The Ultimate Beginner's Trading Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Start Trading Forex Today and Secure Your Financial Future. Learn Technical Analysis, Investing, and Price Action.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Forex Made Simple: The Ultimate Beginner's Course," your gateway to the world of Forex trading, technical analysis, and price action strategies. This comprehensive course is specially crafted for beginners, providing a solid foundation for those eager to explore Forex trading and investing.

Whether you're entirely new to the financial markets or seeking to expand your knowledge, this course will equip you with essential skills and insights to navigate the Forex market confidently. Embark on your journey into the exciting world of Forex trading with our comprehensive course designed for beginners.

Are you a beginner eager to explore the exciting world of Forex trading? If so, "Forex Made Simple: The Ultimate Beginner's Course" is your gateway to mastering the fundamentals of currency trading.


Course Highlights:

1. Forex Trading for Beginners: Our course begins with a thorough introduction to Forex trading, ensuring that you have a strong foundation to build upon. You'll learn what Forex trading is, why it's a popular choice for investing, and how you can start your journey as a Forex trader.

2. Technical Analysis Demystified: Dive into the world of technical analysis, a fundamental tool for any Forex trader. We'll cover chart analysis, price patterns, and key chart concepts. You'll gain the knowledge needed to read and interpret charts effectively and make informed trading decisions.

3. Investing in the Forex Market: Explore the various approaches to Forex trading, from day trading to swing trading. Learn the differences between short-term and long-term strategies and discover which one aligns best with your financial goals.

4. Unleashing the Power of Price Action: Price action is a core component of successful Forex trading. In this course, we'll delve into understanding price movements, candlestick patterns, and chart analysis. You'll develop the skills to interpret price action concepts and apply them to your trading strategy.

5. Risk Management and Psychology: Successful trading isn't just about analysis; it's also about managing risk and maintaining the right mindset. We'll provide you with strategies to protect your capital and help you develop the discipline and psychological resilience required for consistent trading success.


What Sets Our Course Apart:


  • Unique Concepts that Actually Work: Our course offers unique forex trading concepts unlike any other using pure price action analysis concepts. NO NEED FOR INDICATORS.

  • Comprehensive Curriculum: Our course offers a well-rounded curriculum that covers all aspects of Forex trading, ensuring you're well-prepared to navigate the market.

  • Experienced Instructors: Learn from seasoned Forex traders and investing experts who are passionate about sharing their knowledge and guiding beginners.

  • Practical Application: We emphasize hands-on learning through real-world trading exercises, case studies, and simulations, allowing you to apply your newfound skills in a risk-free environment.

  • Community Support: Join our community of fellow learners, where you can engage in discussions, seek advice, and build a network of like-minded individuals.

  • Ongoing Resources: Gain access to a treasure trove of resources, including video tutorials, eBooks, and trading tools, to support your continuous learning journey.


By the end of "Forex Made Simple: The Ultimate Beginner's Course," you'll have the knowledge and confidence to navigate the Forex market effectively. Whether you're pursuing a full-time trading career or looking to supplement your income, this course will empower you to make informed decisions and take control of your financial future.


Don't miss this opportunity to simplify Forex trading and embark on a rewarding journey toward financial independence. Join us today and take your first step towards becoming a successful Forex trader.
targetAudiences: Individuals with little to no prior experience in Forex trading.
Individuals new to Forex trading seeking a solid foundation.
Anyone looking to make informed trading decisions based on price action.
Aspiring Forex traders looking to enhance their technical analysis skills.

Assessment Description:

Information security is an essential component of any organization's operations, as it safeguards the organization's sensitive and confidential data from cyber threats. As a result, organizations must conduct regular information security assessments to ensure that their security measures are adequate and up-to-date.


The Information Security Assessment presented here includes a set of 30 multiple-choice questions covering a range of topics related to information security. These questions cover key concepts such as the purpose of security controls, risk assessment, vulnerability scanning, network segmentation, and more. The assessment is designed to help employees and organizations identify areas where they may need to improve their information security practices.


For employees, understanding information security is becoming increasingly important as the world becomes more digitized. Cyber threats are becoming more sophisticated, and employees need to be aware of the risks to safeguard company data. With the Information Security Assessment, employees can gauge their knowledge of information security and identify areas where they may need additional training.


For companies, the importance of information security assessments cannot be overstated. Cyberattacks are becoming more frequent, and organizations that fail to take appropriate measures to safeguard their data face the risk of significant financial and reputational damage. An information security assessment can help organizations identify potential vulnerabilities and risks and implement appropriate security measures to prevent and mitigate cyber threats.


Conducting regular information security assessments can help companies stay ahead of the curve when it comes to cybersecurity. By identifying potential security gaps and vulnerabilities, organizations can take proactive steps to strengthen their security measures and safeguard their sensitive data. Additionally, regular security assessments can help organizations stay compliant with regulatory requirements and industry standards.


For individuals interested in building a career in information security, understanding the principles of information security is essential. The Information Security Assessment can serve as a valuable tool for identifying areas where additional knowledge and training may be required. Additionally, pursuing a career in information security can be a wise decision, as the demand for skilled professionals in this field continues to grow. Information security professionals are responsible for safeguarding organizational data, preventing cyber threats, and ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements. As cyber threats become more sophisticated, the need for skilled information security professionals will only continue to grow.


Information security is a critical topic for both employees and organizations. Regular information security assessments can help identify potential security risks and vulnerabilities, allowing organizations to take proactive steps to strengthen their security measures. For individuals interested in building a career in information security, the Information Security Assessment can serve as a valuable tool for identifying areas where additional knowledge and training may be required. As the world becomes more digitized, the importance of information security will only continue to grow, and it is essential that individuals and organizations take the necessary steps to safeguard their data from cyber threats.


Linked topics:

  • Assessment

  • Certification

  • Security Hacking

  • Access control

  • Security Certification

  • Information Security

  • Cyber Security

courseDetails.title: Boost Digital Marketing Effectiveness via Behavioral Science
courseDetails.shortDescription: Drive business growth with behavioral science strategies for online customer experience optimization. Get results now!
courseDetails.longDescription:
If you're struggling to increase your online sales or engagement, you're not alone. The truth is, even with the best product or service, it can be challenging to convince people to take action. But what if you could use psychology to influence their decision-making process?

Welcome to my course on Digital Marketing and Behavioral Economics! In this course, you will gain a solid understanding of human psychology and how it applies to digital marketing. You will learn how to influence customer behavior and design choice options that drive sales and engagement.

Here are some of the key values you will gain from this course:

  • Develop a deep understanding of Behavioral Economics and its relevance to digital marketing

  • Master powerful psychological principles that drive online sales, such as Commitment devices, Scarcity, and Social Proof

  • Create easy-to-follow concepts and customer journeys that simplify the purchase process

  • Increase conversion rates and brand engagement using Loss Aversion, Anchoring, and other techniques

courseDetails.title: Disaster Recovery (BCDR) in Azure using ASR, Chaos Studio
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to design resilient disaster recovery solutions in Azure, and ensure business continuity using ASR, Chaos Studio
courseDetails.longDescription:
Disasters can strike at any time, whether it's a natural disaster like a hurricane, a cyber attack, or a hardware failure. For businesses, these events can be catastrophic, resulting in data loss, downtime, and lost revenue. However, with the right disaster recovery plan in place, businesses can minimize the impact of these events and ensure that critical applications and data are available when they are needed most.

The course is designed to provide a comprehensive overview of disaster recovery concepts and best practices, and how they can be applied in the context of Azure. This includes topics such as:

  • Understanding the different types of disasters that can impact businesses, and the potential consequences of data loss and downtime.

  • Learning about the key concepts of disaster recovery, such as RPO, RTO, and high availability.

  • Familiarizing yourself with the different Azure services and features that can be used to implement disaster recovery, such as Azure Site Recovery, Azure Backup, and Azure Virtual Machines.

  • Learning how to configure and test disaster recovery solutions in Azure, including setting up replication, creating recovery plans, and automating failover and failback procedures.

  • Monitoring and troubleshooting your disaster recovery solutions using Azure Monitor and other tools.

Throughout the course, you'll have access to a range of learning resources, including video lectures, step-by-step tutorials, and hands-on exercises. You'll also have the opportunity to ask questions and receive feedback from the instructor, as well as connect with other students in the course.

By the end of the course, you'll have a solid understanding of disaster recovery in Azure, and be equipped with the skills and knowledge needed to design and implement resilient disaster recovery solutions for your business or organization. Whether you're an IT professional, a developer, or a business owner, this course will provide you with valuable insights and practical skills that you can apply in your own work.

  • Our first look at an automated test using the Chrome, Firefox, and Edge browsers

  • Understanding Selectors/Locators in detail

  • How we can interact with various elements found across the web

  • Understanding Webdriver Waits in Detail

  • Quick Java - for those wanting to learn Java or to refresh their knowledge

  • More advanced element interaction using more complex websites

  • Advanced subjects like Chrome Options, SSL certificate handling, cookies, and more

  • Framework overview and understanding of the journey ahead

  • TestNG - everything you need to know about it and how to use it

  • Parametrisation, global variables, and the importance of a base page

  • Maven - how we can use the build automation tool to speed up our Java Project development

  • Page Object Model - learn how to follow good design practices that are maintainable

  • Building a framework from scratch in easy-to-follow steps

  • How to achieve Parallel Execution using Thread Local

  • Jenkins Continuous Integration - how to automatically trigger tests based on the date/time we decide

  • Extent reports - learn how to generate advanced and detailed professional reports

  • Learn how to pull data from Excel using Apache POI

  • And much more!


What makes this course different from others?

  1. You are taught "why" we do things, not just "how" to do things

  2. Each lecture starts with an explanation of what we are going to cover before moving on to a demonstration

  3. All coding lectures have downloadable code examples

  4. The course code is structured so you can easily refer back to the code from a previous lecture in the future

  5. You learn from the very basics all the way to developing a well-designed, professional framework

  6. We cover all key topics, from Selenium Webdriver basics, fundamentals, TestNG, Maven, Extent Reports, Parallel Execution (using Thread Local), Jenkins, Apache POI, and much more

  7. We use good design patterns and I show you step-by-step how to make use of the Page Object Model so that your framework is maintainable

  8. This course comes with a bundled dedicated website and e-commerce store so that you learn actual life-like experiences that you will face in the real world

  9. This course has been recorded with professional recording equipment so that each lesson is crystal clear

  10. You will 100% learn Selenium Webdriver extremely well, and if you are not satisfied, you have 30 days to refund your purchase

Build confidence to pass the Microsoft Azure Fundamentals AZ-900 exam.


This isn’t just a mock test series; it's your guide to conquering the exam. This course will prepare you with the necessary skills and knowledge to pass the Microsoft Azure Fundamentals Exam and grow your Cloud Computing Career.


This course offers more than just practice tests. Each question comes with a detailed explanation, telling you why the correct answer is correct. This helps deepen your understanding and prepares you to handle similar questions in the exam.


About AZ-900 exam

The Exam AZ-900: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals is an entry-level certification exam designed for individuals who want to demonstrate foundational knowledge of Microsoft Azure cloud services. The exam is a part of the Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals certification. This exam covers essential cloud concepts, core Azure services, security, privacy, compliance, and Azure pricing and support.


Here's what the exam includes:


Core Domains:

   ◆ Describe cloud concepts (25–30%)

   ◆ Describe Azure architecture and services (35–40%)

   ◆ Describe Azure management and governance (30–35%)


Exam Dynamics:

   ◆ The exam will have 35-50 questions and last for 60 minutes.

   ◆ Question types will be single select, multiple select, Yes/No, Drag and Drop, and True/False.

   ◆ You'll need to score at least 700 out of 1000 to pass.


Why Pick This Course?:

   ◆ Practice Makes Perfect: Our tests are super close to the real exam.

   ◆ Always Updated: We keep adding new questions, so you're always in the loop.

   ◆ Help on Hand: Got questions? Just ask to Q/A section. We’re here to help.

   ◆ Learn Anywhere: Use the Udemy app and study on the go.

   ◆ Risk-Free: Not happy? There's a 30-day money-back promise.


Equip yourself with the expertise to navigate this exciting domain. Start your Azure journey with us and make the AZ-900 certification a milestone achievement in your career!

courseDetails.title: Basic Conversational Persian / Farsi (without alphabet)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how to speak Persian in the easiest way
courseDetails.longDescription:
If you are willing to learn Persian (Farsi) and have trouble learning numerous difficulties of alphabet and handwriting, this course is made for you!
Persian Language is the official language of Iran, and it's called Dari in Afghanistan and Tajiki in Tajikistan. Despite some nuances, these languages are almost same and comprehensible to each other's speaker. Interestingly (or not), the informal Persian language is not the same as formal one, rather it can be considered a different language, as the grammar and vocabulary change dramatically while talking. Without knowing informal language, you may neither understand nor speak with a native speaker. This course is made to solve this problem for Persian learners, with no need to have any knowledge of Persian/Farsi alphabet - (All scripts are in Latin).
Through this course, you learn the Persian language in the easiest way possible. Each lesson contains a conversation with a specific topic, after which, you are provided with vocabulary and grammars related to the conversation. Each lesson contains at least, two grammar tips, which are explained in a descriptive way in details and some examples for each grammar are provided in the end of each lesson.
If you are interested in Persian language and culture, this course is highly recommended. Join us to learn Persian/Farsi efficiently!
targetAudiences: beginner Persian learners who want to improve their speaking skill

Assessment Description:


Social Media Management and Marketing assessment is an important tool for employees and companies alike, as it helps to evaluate the knowledge and skills required to manage social media accounts and campaigns effectively. In today's digital age, social media platforms have become a crucial part of any business strategy, making it essential for companies to have a strong online presence. Thus, social media management and marketing skills have become increasingly important for professionals across various industries.


For employees, taking a Social Media Management and Marketing assessment can provide numerous benefits. Firstly, it helps to identify any gaps in their knowledge and skills, allowing them to focus on areas that need improvement. Additionally, it can help to boost their confidence and demonstrate to their employer that they are committed to their professional development. It can also increase their employability and provide them with a competitive advantage in the job market, especially in roles that require social media skills such as digital marketing, public relations, and communications.


For companies, a Social Media Management and Marketing assessment can provide valuable insights into the skills and knowledge of their employees, helping to identify areas of strength and weakness. This information can then be used to develop targeted training programs and strategies to improve their social media presence and engagement. It can also help to ensure that their employees are up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in social media management and marketing, which can ultimately help to improve the overall performance of the company.


Moreover, a Social Media Management and Marketing assessment can be an effective way for companies to evaluate potential candidates during the recruitment process. By assessing a candidate's social media skills and knowledge, companies can ensure that they are hiring individuals with the necessary skills and experience to manage their social media accounts effectively. This can help to save time and resources, as it reduces the risk of hiring the wrong person for the job.


Social Media Management and Marketing is a useful topic for building a career as it is a highly sought-after skill set across various industries. It is essential for professionals to have a thorough understanding of social media platforms, trends, and best practices to develop and implement successful social media campaigns. Additionally, social media skills are transferable across industries, allowing professionals to apply their skills in various roles and industries.


Having a strong social media presence and engagement is critical for businesses today, and as a result, companies are looking for professionals who can effectively manage their social media accounts and campaigns. Social media skills can also be leveraged to develop a personal brand, which is becoming increasingly important in today's digital age. By demonstrating their expertise in social media management and marketing, professionals can build a strong personal brand and increase their visibility, which can ultimately help to advance their careers.


Social Media Management and Marketing assessment is an important tool for employees and companies to evaluate their skills and knowledge in social media management and marketing. It can help to identify areas of strength and weakness, develop targeted training programs, and ultimately improve the performance of the company. Social media skills are highly sought after across various industries, making it an essential skill set for professionals looking to advance their careers.

Unlock the boundless world of 3D printing and Fusion 360 in our comprehensive course, "3D Printing Essentials: From Concept to Creation." Designed for absolute beginners, this course is your launchpad into the captivating realms of 3D design, printing, and innovation.


Starting from ground zero, we'll guide you through every step, ensuring a smooth transition from novice to confident creator. Our project-based approach is all about learning by doing, keeping you engaged and motivated as you tackle exciting challenges.


In "Project 1: Puzzle Cube," you'll master Fusion 360, a leading 3D modeling and design software. You'll explore CAD and CAM principles, wield the power of Fusion 360's extrude feature, and gain proficiency in constraint tools, crucial for precise engineering and design.

courseDetails.title: Inhouse Cash Management in SAP S/4 Hana FSCM
courseDetails.shortDescription: In this course we will discuss about Inhouse Cash Management in SAP S/4 Hana FSCM
courseDetails.longDescription:
SAP In-House Cash is used for processing internal and external payment transactions within a group or company. By using SAP In-House Cash you can reduce the number of external bank accounts you hold and the volume of foreign payments you have to make. SAP In-House Cash is implemented at a central location within a group of companies, for example, in head office.

With SAP In-House Cash , you can process the following transactions:

  • Internal payments

  • Central payments

  • Local payments

  • Central incoming payments

The following graphic shows the flow of data within a group of companies that uses SAP In-House Cash in its head office.


To use the In-House Cash functions, make the necessary system settings in the Implementation Guide (IMG) by choosing Financial Supply Chain Management In-House Cash.

Make the following settings in the implementation guide (IMG) under Financial Accounting for the subsidiary companies and head office.


SAP In-House Cash is connected to the head office's Financial Accounting (FI) system, and uses its functions, such as the payment program. The affiliated companies also use Financial Accounting (FI) functions. For instance, they also use the payment program to clear open items. The IDocs generated as a result automatically forward payment orders to the in-house cash center. Electronic account statements for the house bank of the head office can be imported to Financial Accounting (FI), and the data is passed on to the in-house cash center. The affiliated companies also receive an account statement from the in-house cash center.

If you create an IHC financial status , you can forward this to SAP Cash Management .


The main component of SAP In-House Cash is the in-house cash center which processes payments between the various subsidiary companies. The in-house cash center is basically a virtual internal bank where subsidiaries hold current accounts. Current account processing depicts receivables and payables between the in-house cash center and affiliated subsidiary companies. It calculates the turnover and balances of the current accounts and forwards this information in summarized form to Financial Accounting (FI).


You can find the SAP In-House Cash functions on the SAP Easy Access screen under Accounting Financial Supply Chain Management In-House Cash .

Example

The following graphic shows a group of companies, organized to enable both cross-bank-area and local payments:

  • Two companies use SAP In-House Cash and both serve as internal banks for a certain number of subsidiary companies.

  • They are also mutual clearing partners.

  • Subsidiaries 3 and 4 carry out local payments as clearing partners for other subsidiaries.

    International Group Structure

Bank Area

Definition

Organizational unit of Bank Customer Accounts that allows independent account management. This also means that the account numbers that exist in a bank area must be unique.


Structure

Customizing Settings

You make settings for bank areas in Customizing for Bank Customer Accounts (BCA). The important settings are described below:

  • Bank key

  • Check digit method that controls or checks the issuing of account numbers

  • Time at which posting cut-off is to be automatically executed every day

  • Exchange rate category that stores conversion rates in the system

  • Country/region, language, and the public holiday calendar used

Special Feature: Bank Area and Bank Key

The bank key is particularly significant, since bank keys, along with the account number, are used for the processing of payment transactions. All banks participating in payment transactions can be identified by a unique numerical labeling.

Branch offices either have their own bank identification number or one that is related to their main office.

The internal organization of a bank may require several bank areas to depict the bank structure.

One Bank Key Can Involve Several Bank Areas

The system checks that the account number is unique in all bank areas with the same bank key. In addition, to avoid the creation of the same account number simultaneously in different bank areas, the system locks this account number in all bank areas belonging to the bank key.
targetAudiences: SAP S/4 Hana Finance Manager

courseDetails.title: Aprende las bases de AlpineJS con ejemplos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Es como un jQuery pero para webs modernas. Gestiona la interacción de los usuarios con tu página web.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Todo lo que tiene que ver con el Frontend es un mundo increíblemente grande y difícil de estar al día. Existen numerosas herramientas y formas de realizar las cosas.


Pero, hay algo que nos ayuda a gestionar la interactividad que tienen los usuarios con nuestra web... JavaScript. Gracias a JS, podemos hacer que la experiencia del usuario sea una delicia y que sea muy agradable.

¿El problema? Que, a menudo, la experiencia de la persona que desarrolla la web no es tan bonita.


Y es ahí donde entra AlpineJS. Un framework de JavaScript que nos permite gestionar esa interactividad de una forma muy sencilla. Incluso, sin casi ni tener que tocar JavaScript. En este curso, aprenderás las claves mínimas que necesitas para poder trabajar con AlpineJS.

Te enseñaremos a crear Menús desplegables con muy pocas líneas de código. Aprenderás a crear Modales que, además, se pueden cerrar pulsando la tecla "esc". Veremos una forma muy sencilla de crear Tabs/Pestañas que cambian de estilos dependiendo de su estado.

Y, para finalizar, veremos cómo instalar un "Plugin" de AlpineJS para crear una funcionalidad que te encantará.

No lo pienses más y comienza a aprender ahora mismo AlpineJS y sus funcionalidades clave y destacadas.
targetAudiences: Desarrolladores que quieren aprender a utilizar AlpineJS para sus desarrollos

courseDetails.title: Digital, Virtual and AI Photography
courseDetails.shortDescription: Key Concepts and Skills in Post-Photography
courseDetails.longDescription:
Digital, Virtual and AI Photography presents a comprehensive view of computer-based methods for the production and manipulation of photographic imagery. The course is divided into three sections.

The first section on Digital Photography presents thorough coverage of the fundamental principles and techniques of digital photography, whether using a DSLR or mirrorless camera or even just your cell phone. Generative AI approaches to producing photographic images depend on knowing a lot of the technical and conceptual background of traditional photographic techniques, and so this knowledge is essential even if your ultimate goal is to make images primarily with AI.

At the same time, since we all take images with our mobile technologies, the first section will improve your everyday photography skills. And if your goals are to work with more advanced or pro level gear, such as working with DSLRs and mirrorless cameras or studio lighting equipment, the first section covers key topics in those practice areas as well.

The second section on AI Photography explores applying all of the fundamental concepts in the Digital Photography section towards effective prompt writing to produce photographic imagery using AI platforms such as DALL·E 2 and Stable Diffusion. AI prompt writing depends heavily on precise terminology to describe exact features you want the AI to work with, so this section provides a way to revisit core Digital Photography concepts in a new context.

The third section, Virtual Photography, covers the use of real-time rendering environments that can produce photorealistic imagery in HD and UHD (4k). We will use TwinMotion which is a free, easy-to-learn architectural visualization tool based on Unreal Engine, to output photorealistic still images based on real-world scans of textures and environments.
targetAudiences: This course is beginner-friendly.
This course is for artists, designers, media professionals and digital image hobbyists
